html:
2.18.20  10:59 am   if a future person gained access to your website and could read All questions asked of you, what lessons could they learn about humans?

     the english language

2.18.20  10:57 am   how would you explain a cadential 6-4

     never heard of that. but if i had, i would give many examples. even if you gave me just 1 example, i could give you many more

2.18.20  10:53 am   give me some advice on controlling my giant snails.

     the whole trick is to get them not to control you

2.18.20  10:53 am   have any songs you want me to listen to other than your own?

     YOURS

2.18.20  10:37 am   How do I prevent my cat from eating styrofoam?

     make it illegal. that should work

2.18.20  10:33 am   How do you think of things to sing about?

     pretty much everything i ever think, do, or see, i want to sing about. i have developed a system of writing these things down as they occur. so for many years i have been in a constant state of drowning in ideas. but this is something i have learned to deal with in many ways

2.18.20  10:19 am   What does a pizza look like?

     round and flat at the same time, just like the earth

2.18.20  10:14 am   how do you find your passion

     well,

2.18.20  10:08 am   What would happen if he failed to escape the grid using the bike?

     would have to go back and adjust the keyframes

2.18.20  9:47 am   i would like to eat blades of grass but i forgot how. can you tell me how?

     no, i do not know either

2.18.20  9:44 am   What if I (regarding letting music create me) am never ambushed by melodies, however I am bombarded constantly by harmonies to every melodic thing I encounter?

     you might work well as part of a team

2.18.20  9:23 am   are you a princess?

     oh that would explain a lot

2.18.20  9:09 am   Why did you make the questions page?

     so you could ask questions

2.18.20  8:49 am   How's the setup treating you? Enjoying using it so far?

     i am helpless. i have made very many extremely interesting innovations, and yet, overall, compared to what needs to be done, it feels as though i am capable of accomplishing nothing

2.18.20  8:39 am   Could you please tell me what the countdowntimer is at?

     21

2.18.20  8:30 am   when do you think the next video is coming

     i'm having a countdown timer

2.18.20  7:51 am   are bell-bottoms still okay to wear

     yes, if you can find them

2.18.20  7:39 am   I used to enjoy animation and drawing, but now that I have to do it for school I'm loosing my motivation. I'm not free to do what I want with it and I think that's why I don't like doing it anymore. Maybe I should've picked something else to study or maybe it's just how I am, I can't get things done when they're not how I want them to be. The point is, I can't always do what I want, I know that. But I don't know how to rely on something else but my motivation... Do you always rely on your motivation to do things, like your songs, or do you sometimes have to force yourself to do it?

     i'm not sure i understand the difference

      Also, what do you think of school?

     from what i've heard, it sounds like a fun version of jail

     Thank you. Your songs are very inspirational,they put you in this different, whimsical world where reality doesn't have any power. And I love that! 

     oops, i was actually trying to increase the power that reality has

2.18.20  7:10 am   what is your relationship with communism

     we are siblings

     and how is it

     pretty good. a little bit of sibling rivalry, to say the least

2.18.20  6:54 am   Why is school dumb and stupid

     this is to test your intelligence

2.18.20  6:11 am   Do you get bored?

     no

2.18.20  5:09 am   Am I patiently waiting for you to upload a banger?

     yes, that seems correct

2.18.20  3:35 am   Hey bill, how are you doing?

     pretty good

     (Btw i have rewatched all if your videos so many times that i can recite them easily, are you proud?)

     yes

2.18.20  1:58 am   Whats A Box?

     It's a Ball, For Men

2.18.20  1:17 am   how cool do you think you are

     getting ready to achieve level 1

2.18.20  1:02 am   Have you ever imagined imagining?

     that's preposterous. who do you think i am

2.18.20  12:41 am   why are you so cool

     could be some kind of mix up

2.18.20  12:31 am   Why food is important

     it's pretty

2.17.20  11:25 pm   What is the point of asking a good question when the answer is very simple?

     getting a simple answer, which is highly regarded in some cultures

2.17.20  11:04 pm   what's your favorite negative number

     -1

2.17.20  10:45 pm   is there life

     oh that would explain a lot

2.17.20  9:27 pm   what are you in awe of?

      pots and pans,

2.17.20  9:21 pm   Why is the Q in ueqstions green and colored differently

     because it's the first letter of the title. gets to play more, and have fun. like in medieval times

2.17.20  8:57 pm   What's your favorite what-if question

     what if it changes over time

2.17.20  8:07 pm   Do you like watermelons?

     too much water for a melon, too much melon for water

2.17.20  8:03 pm   Want to confess something? 

     1=2

2.17.20  7:45 pm   whens your next song

     right away

2.17.20  7:14 pm   tips and tricks to someone who doesn't know what to do in his life 

     how about prancing through a field of wheat

2.17.20  7:08 pm   Do you know how to photosynthesize yet?

     no

      I almost have it

2.17.20  5:37 pm   Do you consider yourself smart

     put it this way, i am very close to figuring out which way is 'up'

2.17.20  4:43 pm   Do you think llamas are presumptuous? 

     the whole trick to presumptuousness is knowing which things to presume and which things not to presume

2.17.20  4:28 pm   Do you have any advice on how to focus on what you're doing even when your mind keeps going elsewhere? It seems like recently I can't focus on anything more than a short period of time, and this way I never get things done. Might be because I actually have no interest in getting that thing done. But I have to. 

     it might be good to explain what the thing is, how it's done, describe why you think you don't like it

2.17.20  4:27 pm   Why are some things cool while others aren't?

     differences like that are what allows us to even perceive anything at all

      Who decides what gets to be cool and what doesn't?

     no one can even figure it out

2.17.20  3:47 pm   what is an idea?

      a toast sandwich. that's a piece of toast between 2 pieces of bread

2.17.20  3:44 pm   whats your mental state

     garden blast

2.17.20  3:30 pm   how does one create a piece of music?

     have to let the music create you, but if it is feeling stubborn sometimes you can coax it by poking it with a small stick

     like, how do you come up with a good melody, and how do you pick chords to go with it? or is it the other way round?

     it's best when it ambushes you all at once

      i have no idea how to create music but i feel like i want to

     no one actually knows what music is. but so far you are on the right track

2.17.20  2:56 pm   Who is the best boy?

     could be a girl

2.17.20  2:56 pm   What's a cow?

     it's kind of like a boat

2.17.20  2:44 pm   what video are you going to make next?

     i am more interested in the videos i will make after that, but for now i will continue to stumble through the helpless darkness

2.17.20  2:24 pm   are all your short <10 second jingles music lessons? for us break em down and see why it sounds good, sort of thing?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

      you even show us the instruments used (usually, and some conditions apply)

     well, not quite, but i do quite often show the notes and chords used. even if i don't they can still clearly be heard
